lead_paragraph: Adam Peaty smashed his own world record for the second time in two days on Sunday to win 100 meters breaststroke gold and become the first British male swimmer in 28 years to win an Olympic title.

headline.print_headline: Swimming: Peaty Takes 100m Breaststroke Gold in Record Time
headline.main: Swimming: Peaty Takes 100m Breaststroke Gold in Record Time

snippet: Adam Peaty smashed his own world record for the second time in two days on Sunday to win 100 meters breaststroke gold and become the first British male swimmer in 28 years to win an Olympic title....
